topic.title: Devices Patient Level Contract Monitoring Data Set
topic.shortdesc: IntroductionThe purpose of the Devices Patient Level Contract Monitoring Data Set (DePLCM) is to enable the interchange, in a uniform format, of monthly PATIENT level device Contract Monitoring data between all purchasers and Health Care Providers.
